Issue.creator: boydjohnson
Issue.summary: Update context manager to handle deletes
Issue.description: This should be handled at the _ContextFuture level, by storing whether the address has been deleted. If a set happens after a delete, the delete flag should be unset again. In squash and create_context, if the last thing that happened to an address is a delete, that address should be deleted from the MerkleDatabase. Appropriate methods on the context manager and _StateContext are needed.
